headline.main: MEN OF THE O'BRIEN AT SAN FRANCISCO; Sunken Warship's Commander and Crew Voice Eagerness to Ship Again as Unit

lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Nov. 2 -- Lieut. Comdr. Thomas Burrowes, a graduate of Curtis High School on Staten Island, N.Y., was in San Francisco today with the entire complement of the sunken destroyer O'Brien, eager to be assigned as a unit to a new destroyer for another crack at the Japanese.
abstract: Lt Comdr T Burrowes and crew of sunken destroyer O'Brien arrive, San Francisco; describe sinking; rept no deaths or major injuries; group por
